pci_projects_project_serving_namespace_t: An error has occurred creating the token: {{ message }}
Your token has been generated, please save it

Tokens can be assigned to a specific model, or to your full namespace by using the wildcard "*". You can also specify if the token privileges are limited to model administration, model evaluation, or both.

The resource must begin with a lower-case or upper-case alphanumeric character (a- z and 0-9), may include the following punctuation marks: “.” and “-”, and can end with “*” to include all of the sub-resources.
Management (updates, deletion) of models via the hub
